content:
In the Mass Effect series, the Elcor are a fictional alien race that are known for their quadrupedal appearance and slow, methodical speech pattern. They have a large, heavy body, with four legs and a thick tail. They have a very low-pitched and monotone voice. The Elcor are native to the planet Dekuuna and their society is centered around their home planet.

Elcor are a highly intelligent and technologically advanced race, known for their wisdom and caution. They are considered to be a peaceful species and have a strong sense of community. They have a strong sense of tradition and social hierarchy. They are also known for being very deliberate and methodical in their actions, and they tend to take a long time to make decisions. This is reflected in their slow speech patterns and use of long, complex sentences.

In the game, Elcor are known for their intelligence and their ability to think strategically. They are also known for their loyalty and their willingness to work with other species. They are respected and admired by other races in the galaxy for their wisdom and their peaceful nature. They are also known for their strong sense of duty and their desire to protect and serve their community. They are also seen as a strong and reliable ally in the game.
